plot: A New York City bartender is having a rough night. Time is dragging and customers are difficult. Sasha dreams of escape; of horses and green fields, but freedom is a lot closer than she thinks.
title: Raising the Bar
plot_es: A New York City bartender is having a rough night. Time is dragging and customers are difficult. Sasha dreams of escape; of horses and green fields, but freedom is a lot closer than she thinks.
plot_en: A New York City bartender is having a rough night. Time is dragging and customers are difficult. Sasha dreams of escape; of horses and green fields, but freedom is a lot closer than she thinks.
